page.title: 14Kirsty's Weekend
page.content: On Saturday morning,I woke up,early.I had my breakfast and watched television.After that I went to call on my friend{Kelly.}She was still in her pyjamas.After she got dressed we went out to play and as usual we played with the skateboard,the stilts the rope,the crate and the little ramp.First we played with the skateboard.We tied the rope round { {Kelly's}waist and I pulled her down the hill.{Kelly }ripped two of her skirts but I only ripped one of mine. So we stopped playing with the skateboard.Then we went to play on the stilts.We had races and went up and down the kerbs.Then it was time to go to the school barbecue,I had a hamburger.After that I went into { {Peterhead}to get a present for{Laura, my friend{Johan's}sister.We went to their house and stayed till 10.30. {
